result.execSummary:
The defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: *Fine of $500.00 including all mandatory costs, fees and DNA surcharges to be paid $125.00 forthwith and balance by 07/01/16 or serve 10 days in the HOC.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kourtney Leshon Edwards

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: F&C Commitment issued for failure to pay.  10 days HOC, consecutive.  Due & owing

Defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

Fine of $500.00 including  all mandatory costs, fees and dna surcharges to be paid $125.00 forthwith and balance by  7-1-16  or serve 10 consecutive  days in the House of Correction.

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 47. lr  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 10-01-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.    Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 47. lr  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-17-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Alyssa M. Schaller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 47. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 08-03-2015 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered Defendant not to be in possession of any illegal drugs without a valid prescription.

Defendant Kourtney Leshon Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to Defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 47.
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 5/12/15 @ 1:30 pm
